original_text: I will judge Jerusalem and I will punish the people, as I punished Samaria and the family of King Ahab. I will remove the people from Jerusalem, like someone who washes the dirt from both sides of a plate.
korean_text: 내가 사마리아를 잰 줄과 아합의 집을 다림 보던 추를 예루살렘에 베풀고 또 사람이 그릇을 씻어 엎음 같이 예루살렘을 씻어 버릴지라

sentences.original_text: and I will punish the people
and the family of King Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아합 왕의 가족을 벌했던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: I will remove the people from Jerusalem
like someone who washes the dirt
from both sides of a plate
